name: Astro Drift
description:
Gravity moves the ufo through space, without gravity it will just keep drifting forever. Special technology on the spaceship allows them to activate or deactivate forces of gravity action upon the craft. You are taking over as chief navigator, activate it to change direction, but be careful not to carelessly fall into a stray asteroid. ..And he is going to earth to arrest Raeleus, except Raeleus is already dead after the loading screen.

How to play:

press space or click the gravity button to activate and deactivate gravity  press backspace to restart from checkpoint                                                                                              press R to return to menu                                                                                                                                    progress further and unlock higher difficulty levels by passing the highest unlocked level                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   can you go past  lvl 20
